name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Defiant_Barrage_E
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Defiant Barrage E
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power and requires the user to be level 50.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy and Damage, Increases Attack Rate, and Reduces Endurance Cost
